system.effect: Disrupts all psychic communication in the region by emitting a wave of agony. A Psyker using this component takes 2d5 Damage to the body, reduced by Toughness but not armour, and taking 1d5-1 Fatigue, They then make -10 Focus Power Test. If successful all attempts at warp communication in the system suffer -10 per 3 DoS
